definitions.title: coll.
definitions.body: moving things (i.e. beasts) (etym. & exact meaning still rather dub., cf. Che:OP 472 and on Ps 50:11; Thes al. √ [[זוז]]; De Ps 50:11 comp. As. zizânu, coll. reptiles, Dl:S. 74 f. from a [[זִאזֵא]] cf. za9za9a move to and fro, agitate (cf. [[זוע]]); others comp. As. zâzu, abundance v. II. [[זוז]], so even Di Is 66:11; this hardly suits Ps 80:14; Targum [[זִיזׇא]] worm);—only cstr. [[זִיז שָׂדַי]] Ps 50:11 the moving things of the field, as all known to ´[[י]] (‖[[עוֹף הָרִים]]; also in v:Ps 50:10 [[חַיְתוֹ־יׇ֑עַר]], etc.); fig. of enemies of Isr. Ps 80:14 (‖[[חֲזִיר מִיׇּ֑עַר]]).
